xmldoc.short_description: Retrieve image data from a movie frame.

param_input_item.param_description: a structure: Movie frame, represented as a structure with two fields: cdata: An array of uint8 values storing the image data. colormap: The colormap. This field is empty ([]) for truecolor (RGB) images. A movie frame structure can be created using the im2frame and getframe functions.

param_output_item.param_description: c-by-3 numeric matrix: Colormap corresponding to the indexed image X, returned as a c-by-3 numeric matrix with values in the range [0, 1]. Each row of the matrix represents an RGB triplet defining the red, green, and blue components of a colormap color.

description.p: RGB = frame2im(F) extracts the truecolor (RGB) image from the movie frameF.
[X, map] = frame2im(F) retrieves the indexed imageX and its corresponding colormap map from the movie frameF.
